message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $115. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I'm eager to make a deal, $105 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $110?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $108.
